name: Day Hunt
description:
Q. Rose has seen the creature outside his house again. He is ready to (and finally will)  face it. Can he convince his friends to take the time out of their busy lives to help?

Day Hunt is a little less about mysterious creatures and a little more about friendship, but there's a mysterious creature too so don't worry.  Meant to be a laid-back experience, choices exist to direct the flow of the story but do not impact it, so there's no need to worry about missing things or going back.

This is the still-short but much longer sequel to Night Hunt, at around an hour or under playtime.  Reading Night Hunt is not necessary to understanding the story (but can you guess what gemstones/minerals all the new characters are based on?).
